#####################################################################
Our friends over at CuttleReefStudios are creating a new adult RPG!

Love in Pieces

Follow the story of Ansel Draycott how he turns his curse into a
magical contract and moves himself ontop of the adventurer food chain
through what else than fucking around!
A mix of 3d first person dungeon crawler, visual novel style choice-based story and
an action RPG fighting system inspired by Claire Obscure and Paper
Mario.

If this got your attention then check out their game page over at:
https://www.patreon.com/cuttlereefstudios

Just add yourself as a free member through the ... menu on the right
to never miss an update.
